summary: **Sonic the Hedgehog** is a popular video game series about a blue hedgehog who fights the evil Doctor Eggman. Created by Sega in 1991, it helped make Sega a top gaming company. The games are mostly platformers, with Sonic running through levels, collecting rings, and defeating enemies. The franchise also includes movies, comics, and toys. Sonic is one of the best-selling gaming franchises, loved for its fast-paced fun and unique characters. Even though some newer games got mixed reviews, Sonic remains a big influence in gaming and pop culture.
title: Sonic the Hedgehog
